short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add forum code help buttons to the post topic/reply/pm pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds buttons that simplify adding UBB codes for displaying images and quotes, etc. It also fixes the text input box width issue.
